DOC.detailed_description: Background : Identification measurement fetal heart tracing throughout pregnancy labor crucial well-being fetus . Non reassure fetal heart rate one common indication operative vaginal delivery cesarean section . Therefore , management labor require reliable accurate information fetal heart rate . In normal spontaneous labor , fetal heart rate characterize baseline heart rate ( 110 160 beat per minute ) , variability ( beat beat change ) periodic change ( acceleration deceleration ) . In stage labor trace may different characteristic , variable deceleration much common end second stage labor . Objective : To Show non inferiority EUM fetal doppler scalp electrode compare reliability accuracy EUM versus fetal doppler compare scalp electrode patient . METHODS The current method detect fetal heart rate fetal Doppler , routinely use practically labor , base Doppler technology detect heart valve motion blood velocity . The fetal Doppler transducer place abdomen parturient susceptible positional change parturient . Moreover , among obese gravida , fetal heart rate tracing via external fetal Doppler may difficult achieve . Another method monitoring fetal heart rate scalp electrode attach fetal scalp record heart rate pattern . This method invasive use amniotic membrane rupture . Monitoring scalp electrode superior fetal Doppler direct non-affected maternal position . However , invasive method may contribute development fever labor .
